tree.name: Vit Krejci
tree.tradeDescription: Acquired from Atlanta Hawks for Duop Reath, 2027 ATL 2nd, and 2030 NYK 2nd

assetsGivenUp.name: Duop Reath
assetsGivenUp.note: Australian center, signed by Portland. Underwent season-ending foot surgery.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 2nd Round Pick (via ATL)
assetsGivenUp.note: Atlanta's 2027 2nd round pick, sent back to ATL in Krejci trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2030 2nd Round Pick (via NYK)
assetsGivenUp.note: New York Knicks' 2030 2nd round pick, sent to ATL in Krejci trade
